Project Description
Windows 8 Gelocation API sample for built-in and USB based GPS devices


This sample demonstrates the use of geolocation api in Windows 8. The code also explicitly suggest api to choose most accurate gps input (Which may be built in GPS as well as USB based GPS Antenna) .
